title: Will this be fixed? its really frustrating :(
body:
In almost every game i get this now instead of champion mastery, it looks like its loading but nothing ever loads, so i never find out my grade or how many points i earned for that champion.
the picture included is of the game when i reached level 5 mastery with yasuo, as soon as the game finished it gave me the popup message saying "congrats on lvl 5 etc." and the animation of the emote, but even after that it didnt load the circle thing (even though it must have already figured out my points since it realised i was now lvl 5) and it didnt show up in the chat either, i waited for ages to get my grade but nothing ever loaded so now i don't know what grade i got when i got Yas to lvl 5 :( 
this happens basically very game with a few exceptions, (i have noticed that it happens far more often when you win a game) 
so i was wondering if a rioter could confirm if this is being fixed or not?

its also only been happening since last patch, it never happened once before that.

replies.body:
Hi folks,

Thanks for the report on this.  We're aware of the issue and working on a fix.  I don't have an ETA right now, but just wanted to let you know that we are on the case :)

Cheers
Mindstar
Awesome! Thanks for letting us know :) i appreciate it
Been happening to me a lot more than usual lately too :(

YAY i wasnt the only one. i guess since it called you as level 5 you are still getting the points, just it wasnt showing at end game.
and yeah, a whole week, but i just had a game where it showed my points at the end so maybe its fixed?
Is it just me or have I saw 3 posts like this in past 7 days
First time after a log on it just won't give you a score.
Yeah I don't why it is happening I thought it was just me and that my net was being slow.
